topics.body:
I am reading a manga.

There's a country full of dragon breeders/tamers and the hero got his dragon late. When he did, the dragon he hatched was a little girl (but still a dragon). So yeah, there are a lot of naked girls scenes and I don't think that the little girl dragon being naked counts as one though (she doesn't have the girly parts).
